description:
The sound of a conch shell echoes over the Warring States battlefield. Amidst the tension of the standoff between the Banana Army and the Kitty Army, Bananya makes his appearance. Without even knowing why, he`s suddenly named the general of the Banana Army. Despite Bananya`s bewilderment, the time has come to do battle!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: The Great Warring States Battle, Nya!
せんごくだいかっせん, にゃ!
